oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dutch Mill, Shelby Park, Nashville, circa 1909
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A color postcard of the Dutch Mill in Shelby Park, Nashville, Tennessee. This windmill structure, no longer extant, once stood on the landscape of Shelby Park, in East Nashville, near the Cumberland River. In 1909, Shelby Park was acquired by the Park Commission from the Shelby family. Forms part of the Nashville Room Postcard Collection. 1 postcard : col. ; 3.5 x 5.5 in.
